Selected Answer: D
The AWS service that the company should use to maintain and protect its critical business applications without having enough staff is AWS Managed Services (AMS). AMS provides infrastructure operations management for AWS, which includes proactive monitoring, automation, and management of customersâ€™ infrastructure environments.

Selected Answer: D
The AWS service that can help the company maintain and protect its critical business applications in the AWS Cloud is AWS Managed Services (AMS). AMS provides a range of managed services for the AWS infrastructure, including management of the application stack, infrastructure, and AWS services. This service can help the company reduce operational overhead, improve security and compliance, and accelerate cloud adoption. So, Option D is the correct answer.

Selected Answer: D
D is the answer.

Which AWS service should the company use to conduct the test with the LEAST amount of operational overhead?

discussion.content: A , B & D are Storage Services.. and C & E are Database Services...

Amazon RDS and Amazon DynamoDB

DYNAMO DB NOSQL

Selected Answer: CE
C. Amazon RDS: Amazon RDS (Relational Database Service) is a fully managed database service that supports popular relational database engines such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQL Server, and Amazon Aurora. It handles administrative tasks such as database setup, patching, backups, and automated backups, allowing users to focus on their applications rather than database management.

E. Amazon DynamoDB: Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service that provides fast and predictable performance with seamless scalability. It offers automatic scaling, built-in security, and automated backups, making it an ideal choice for applications that require low-latency data access and flexible scaling.

Selected Answer: CE
C. Amazon RDS
E. Amazon DynamoDB.

A cloud engineer needs to track AWS costs. The cloud engineer also needs to receive event driven alerts when costs exceed specific thresholds.

Which AWS tool provides this functionality?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
AWS Budgets set a limit for AWS cost.

comments.content:
its written Topic 1: Single topic , will it cover everything for exam? . 
And after page 49 not able to access, why is that?

discussion.content: B. AWS Budgets. key word - 'alert'

Selected Answer: B
B. AWS Budgets 
"Using AWS Budgets, you can set a budget that alerts you when you exceed (or are forecasted to exceed) your budgeted cost or usage amount. You can also set alerts based on your RI or Savings Plans Utilization and Coverage using AWS Budgets."
https://aws.amazon.com/aws-cost-management/aws-budgets/faqs/

Selected Answer: B
AWS Budgets lets you set custom cost and usage budgets that alert you when your budget thresholds are exceeded (or forecasted to exceed).

Selected Answer: B
Using AWS Budgets, you can set a budget that alerts you when you exceed (or are forecasted to exceed) your budgeted cost or usage amount. You can also set alerts based on your RI or Savings Plans Utilization and Coverage using AWS Budgets.

Selected Answer: B
B is the answer.

Selected Answer: B
it is b

Selected Answer: B
The AWS tool that provides this functionality is B. AWS Budgets.

AWS Budgets is a service that allows customers to set budgets for their AWS usage costs and receive alerts when actual costs exceed those budgets. By using budgets, the engineer can create a customized budget plan and put constraints on the spending of resources. It allows to set custom budgets, track costs and usage across multiple dimensions, and receive alerts when certain thresholds are exceeded.

AWS Cost Explorer is a service that allows users to visualize, understand and manage their AWS costs, AWS Cost and Usage Reports provides detailed cost and usage information, Cost allocation tags are used for identifying and organizing AWS costs, but none of these services provide the event-driven alerts when costs exceed specific thresholds.

Selected Answer: B
B. AWS Budgets

With AWS Budgets, set custom budgets to track your costs and usage, and respond quickly to alerts received from email or SNS notifications if you exceed your threshold.
 
Ref link: https://aws.amazon.com/aws-cost-management/aws-budgets/#:~:text=With%20AWS%20Budgets%2C%20set%20custom,if%20you%20exceed%20your%20threshold.

Selected Answer: B
B!!!! Budgets for cost alerts

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A company that has an AWS Business Support plan has access to:

A. AWS Support concierge

The AWS Support concierge service provides assistance with billing and account-related inquiries, helping customers with their AWS account and billing questions.

While AWS Business Support does provide access to a dedicated technical account manager (TAM) for an additional fee, this is not included by default with the Business Support plan.

The AWS DDoS Response Team (DRT) is a feature of AWS Shield Advanced, which is a separate service from AWS Support plans.

The AWS Health API is a publicly available AWS service and is not tied specifically to support plans.
